妠字的基本解释

妠
nà
娶。

妠
nàn
古女子人名用字。

妠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nà］
［《廣韻》奴答切，入合，泥。］
［《廣韻》奴紺切，去勘，泥。］
纳，娶。
[②]［nà］
［《廣韻》女刮切，入鎋，娘。］
见“婠妠”。

妠字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妠； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页256第34
【廣韻】奴荅切【集韻】諾荅切，?音納。娶也。一曰聚物。一曰小兒肥貌。【韓愈詩】巴豔收婠妠。　又【集韻】奴姏切，音?。取也，入也。　又乃甘切，音耼。義同。　又女名。後漢順烈皇后名妠。

妠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
妠字的起名意思

古女子人名用字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nà］
["Guangyun" slave answer cuts, enters together, mud. ]
["Guangyun" slave cut, go to survey, mud. ]
Na, marry.
[②]［nà］
["Guangyun" female scrapes, enters, mother. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妠; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 256 34
[Guang Yun] Slave Cut [Ji Yun] Nox Cut, Sound Na. Marry too. One is polymer. One is the fat appearance of children. [Han Yushi] Ba Yan received the prince.　[Jiyun] Slave cut, sound?. Take it, enter it.　Naigan cut again, sound pan. The same meaning.　Also female name. The name of Queen Shunlie of the Later Han Dynasty.
